items.title: SVGL - A beautiful library with SVG logos

experiences.title: Content Creator
experiences.description: I spread the word about programming and web development on different platforms. Awarded best non-English speaking content creator in 2022 and best community in 2023 by GitHub.

experiences.title: Principal Frontend Engineer
experiences.description: Responsible for the platform, components and utilities for the creation and development of web applications. 30% improvement in software delivery. Implementation of continuous integration measures and deployment with A/B testing in more than 15 teams.

about.title: About me
about.content1: My name is Beatriz Manrique AvendaÃ±o, AKA mavend. In my university career I have seen many technology applications and I find a lot of interest in programming and Networking. I am currently looking for training spaces to <0>put my knowledge into practice and perform in a professional field</0>.
about.content2: I have participated in <0>demanding projects, both mobile and web, deployment experience in services such as Azure, Google Cloud Platform and AWS</0>, as well as in implementations of SDN and Cloud Computing solutions; and a meaningful understanding in Linux.
about.content3: Being close to graduation, <0>I am always looking for opportunities to continue learning, including online Machine Learning courses and other technologies that complement my academic training.
